channel.title: Server -- Start up help
channel.description: Okay, I always seem to have this problem. But I usually find out how to fix it. But now I am clueless... anyways, I believe it has to do with my no-ip and my portforwarding. First, on no-ip, i put the ip that is on the portforward (which i am pretty sure you dont do) and no one can connect. My portforward setting are TCP on ports 43594 and the client and server are set up on that. Just doesn't seem to be connecting :( if anyone can help it will be deeply appreciated. (I have used the "How to Start a Server" in the server tuts section. didn't help me)

item.description:

Okay, I always seem to have this problem. But I usually find out how to fix it. But now I am clueless… anyways, I believe it has to do with my no-ip and my portforwarding. First, on no-ip, i put the ip that is on the portforward (which i am pretty sure you dont do) and no one can connect. My portforward setting are TCP on ports 43594 and the client and server are set up on that. Just doesn’t seem to be connecting if anyone can help it will be deeply appreciated. (I have used the “How to Start a Server” in the server tuts section. didn’t help me)
